reviews.review_msg: seriously, i would never take his class again.... NEVER

Everyone complains that this course is difficult, but he is very reasonable. This is a writing course so he is picky on grammar. All upper division courses are difficult, and this one is as well as it is a W course. Dr. Mellow is always available for help when you need it.

Although he's known to be a tough marker, I think he's probably one of the professors that actually make sense during the lectures. His classes are very informative, but dry. He is very helpful indeed. To do well in his class, never get help last minute.
